name: scrapter-hosting
description: Build and deploy scripts for Scrapter

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:vue && npm run build:flutter
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run copy:vue && npm run copy:flutter && npm run serve
scripts.serve:local: cd dist && python3 -m http.server 8000 || python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8000
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run copy:vue && npm run copy:flutter && firebase deploy --only hosting
